direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve comparing Boolean values and determining their order or equality.
Both methods are part of the standard Object class methods and are often tested together to ensure consistent behavior.
The equals method relies on the trueFirst field, which is accessed by the sortsTrueFirst method.
The booleanComparator method returns instances of BooleanComparator that can be tested for equality using the equals method.
The getFalseFirstComparator method returns a specific instance of BooleanComparator that can be tested for equality using the equals method.
The getTrueFirstComparator method returns a specific instance of BooleanComparator that can be tested for equality using the equals method.
